A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It makes no sense to me why this is has such a low audience rating here.  Yes\, there are a few plot holes\, and they're annoying\, but it is more than made up for with some epic cinematics and solid new additions to the force mythos (no midichlorians).  I still prefer Empire\, A New Hope\, and even Rogue One to Last Jedi\, but it's still far and above a better movie than any of the prequels\, and on par with ROTJ.
